title: A Special Stage!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>....and so like, we were thinking of using helis to help support the μ’s stage~. It’s a good idea, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Uwaah~.... As expected of μ’s! I really want to see that live!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, I’m still sorting it out with Nikocchi, so I’ll let you know when we go through with it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Alright! Also, I kind of want Aqours to do a live on a special stage like that too! μ’s already used helis, so.... we can use.... Hmm, what would be good?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Let’s see.... How about we ask Kanan to bring out her boat?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>A boat! Let’s have the boat pull our stage and have a live using the entirety of Uchiura’s ocean!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow, you so daring, Chikacchi~. Mari loves that part of you♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>We need to sing really loudly so our voices won’t get lost in the winds, right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Then I guess we need special training, huh.... Ok! I’ll go talk to Kanan about the special training too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh!? Special training.... Ah, wait! Mari-chan!? Mari-chaaan~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
